I love writing and coding
I'm a technical writer and developer.

About me

I'm based in Sicily, in the extreme South of Italy. I graduated in Computer Engineering and I've many years of experience as a Developer. My biggest passions are coding and writing, this is why I decided to pursuit the Technical Writer career. In this website you can find some samples of tech writing, a list of open-source contributions and a reference to some Medium articles I wrote.
